text: Tornjoš (in Serbian Cyrillic: Торњош, in ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Senta municipality, in the North Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Hungarian ethnic majority (82.21%) with a present Romani minority (14.49%) and its population numbering 1,766 people (2002 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina ==External links== *History of Tornjoš Category:Places in Bačka Category:Senta
title: Tornjoš
